column1: Baby Barnaby's////Not one single item on the menu is bad...but think about this; if you want to forget about Chick-fil-a waffle fries
column2: you have got you give your mouth a party with these waffle fries with blue cheese fondue...they are fantastic!!! No really!!! This is the "I had a bad day and I need love now" comfort food. MMMMMM....
